akn:content.akn:p: (c) Each notice of solicitation required by paragraph (1) or (2) of subsection (a) shall include—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Electronic Publication of Notice of Solicitation, Award, or Order.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) A notice of solicitation, award, or order required to be published under subsection (a) shall be published by electronic means. The notice must be electronically accessible in a form that allows convenient and universal user access through the single Government-wide point of entry designated in the Federal Acquisition Regulation.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Consideration of Certain Timely Received Offers.—

akn:content.akn:p: (f) An executive agency intending to solicit offers for a contract for which a notice of solicitation is required to be posted under subsection (a)(1) shall ensure that contracting officers consider each responsive offer timely received from an offeror.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Availability of Complete Solicitation Package and Payment of Fee.—

akn:content.akn:p: (g) An executive agency shall make available to a business concern, or the authorized representative of a concern, the complete solicitation package for any on-going procurement announced pursuant to a notice of solicitation under subsection (a). An executive agency may require the payment of a fee, not exceeding the actual cost of duplication, for a copy of the package.
